thread.title: Sina’s Profit Falls on Lower Investment Gains
thread.title_full: Sina’s Profit Falls on Lower Investment Gains - WSJ

author: Maria Armental
title: Sina’s Profit Falls on Lower Investment Gains
text:
Chinese Internet company Sina Corp.’s second-quarter profit fell sharply on lower investment gains that masked higher revenues driven by its microblog portal Weibo Corp.
Shares, up 4% this year, rose 3% to $39.98 in late trading, while Weibo’s shares surged...
